alert.note: Alert for Macon; Marion; Schley; Sumter; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 8:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Macon, southeastern Marion, east central Webster, Schley and northwestern Sumter Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Friendship, or 8 miles northeast of Preston, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Americus, Ellaville, Plains, Andersonville, Putnam, Friendship, Doyle, Bumphead, La Crosse, Dumas, Draneville and Walls Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
